title: Does the 50 deck contain hero cards or not?

comments.content: The second.  50 card minimum does not count heroes.  They are separate from the player deck.
The heroes are not inclueded in the 50 card minimum, as the heroes is not a part of the player deck, unless a card effect specifies to the contrary
